title: Support printing
body: It would be great to be able to print the contents of a console window as displayed and also flowed to best fit the printer's current paper selection.

comments.body: You can always type your command followed by "> output.txt" to save the command's output to a file. From there you can print it as much as you want.
The abilty to save the current content would be nice too.
Roger that. I was sure we had a printing item on our backlog, but it's either been dropped or -- more likely -- I'm just missing it. We'll discuss in planning -- thanks! --Rich
